programme.title: A Lonely Place to Die
programme.desc: Five mountaineers stumble into a vicious kidnapping scheme after they rescue a child they find buried alive in the Scottish Highlands.

programme.title: Breaking the Girls
programme.desc: Two college students (Agnes Bruckner, Madeline Zima) begin a steamy affair and pledge to kill each other's enemies.

programme.title: The Other Man
programme.desc: After his wife Lisa disappears on a business trip, Peter finds evidence that she has been having an affair with Ralph. He flies to Milan and enters into a complicated charade by befriending Ralph and slowly teasing information about Lisa out of him.

programme.title: The Housemaid
programme.desc: A middle-aged housekeeper loses her sanity after being forced to abort an illegitimate fetus by her master.

programme.title: Midnighters
programme.desc: When a couple accidentally hit a man with their car, they put him in the backseat and go home to avoid the consequences.

programme.title: Beneath the Darkness
programme.desc: Teenagers discover a terrible secret when they break into the home of a mortician (Dennis Quaid) whose wife died two years earlier.

programme.title: Prisoner X
programme.desc: A CIA agent arrives at a secret underground prison to interrogate a time-traveling terrorist believed to be behind a global civil war.

programme.title: Bushwick
programme.desc: Lucy emerges from a Brooklyn subway to find that her neighborhood is under attack by black-clad military soldiers. An ex-Marine corpsman, Stupe, reluctantly helps her fight for survival through a civil war as Texas attempts to secede from the U.S.

programme.title: Freeway Killer
programme.desc: Californian serial killer William Bonin (Scott Anthony Leet) searches for victims on the state's highways.

programme.title: Into the Ashes
programme.desc: Nick is an ex-con who's adjusting to a new job, a new wife and some semblance of normalcy in rural Alabama. When vengeful former associates track him down, he's soon forced back into the desperate and violent life that he thought he left behind.

programme.title: Way of the Wicked
programme.desc: When a town is swept by a series of gruesome killings, a mysterious priest (Christian Slater) seems to be the only one who can help protect them from a truth more evil than any of them could have imagined.

programme.title: Adulterers
programme.desc: A husband comes home early on his wedding anniversary and finds his wife in bed with another man. The lovers quickly learn how far a jealous husband will go when uncontrollable passions erupt.

programme.title: Terminal
programme.desc: Murderous consequences unravel in the dead of night as the lives of two assassins, a teacher, a janitor and a waitress intertwine at the hands of a mysterious criminal mastermind who's out for revenge.

programme.title: Always and Forever
programme.desc: When a woman's childhood friends begin to die under mysterious circumstances, she becomes convinced their deaths are tied to dark secrets from her past.
